titleStmt.title: Physiologia Epicuro-Gassendo-Charltoniana, or, A fabrick of science natural, upon the hypothesis of atoms founded by Epicurus repaired [by] Petrus Gassendus ; augmented [by] Walter Charleton ...
titleStmt.author: Charleton, Walter, 1619-1707.
Epicurus.
Gassendi, Pierre, 1592-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb for Thomas Heath ...,

notesStmt.note: A second volume on the human soul was planned. Cf. Conclusion. Apparently never published.
Reproduction of original in University of Chicago Library.
